  age <- c(34, 28, 22, 36, 27, 18, 52, 39, 42, 29, 35, 31, 27, 22, 37, 34, 
           19, 20, 57, 49, 50, 37, 46, 25, 17, 37, 42, 53, 41, 51, 35, 24, 33, 41)

length(age)

recip <- 1 / age
library("MASS")
fractions(recip)

new_age <- c(age, 0, age)

sort(age)

min(age)
max(age)

data <- c(2.4, 2.8, 2.1, 2.5, 2.4, 2.2, 2.5,
2.3, 2.5, 2.3, 2.4, 2.7)
length(data)
doudata <- data * 2

s1 <- seq(1:100)
s2 <- seq(20:60)

s3 <- mean(s2)

s4 <- sum(51:91)

s5 <- seq(1:1000)

length(s1) + length(s2) + length(s3) + length(s4)

Filter(function(i) { all(i %% c(3,5,7) != 0) }, seq(100))

s5 <- seq(100,1)
s5

vec <- c(24:1)

Filter(function(i) { all(i %% c(3) == 0) | all(i %% c(5) == 0) }, vec)
